config.maidcode.title: Maid Code Settings
config.maidcode.is_gly_mode.tip: Admit you're noob and let maids program for you
config.maidcode.fun_config.tip: Control the functions maids can use
Beginner's Guide to Maid Code Mod$(br2)(Do people really have maids write code in their Minecraft world?)
patchouli.maidcode.book.entries.maid.how: This mod is powered by the maid AI conversation system, allowing maids to program computers through function calls.$(br2)Before use, ensure the maid's AI chat function calling feature is enabled. Simply switch the maid's work mode to 'Programming' and mention 'computer' in chat, and the maid will locate nearby computers to program.
The favorability requirement for programming tasks can be disabled in the configuration.$(br2)All available functions can be viewed in the mod configuration interface.
patchouli.maidcode.book.entries.maid.con: If you feel too many features are consuming AI Tokens, you can disable some.$(br2)You can adjust this mod's configuration in either Maid Code or the main Touhou Little Maid settings.$(br)The configuration interface allows enabling/disabling each FunctionCall (feature).
patchouli.maidcode.book.entries.maid.hel: If the computer mod's code isn't working, you can have the maid fix it,$(br)or manually modify it by consulting the computer mod's wiki.
If it's a bug in the author's mod,$(m)you can also have the maid fix it$() or report it to the author's GitHub.
patchouli.maidcode.book.entries.maid.how: We must believe she is happy
task.maidcode.programming_task.desc: The maid will program when receiving requests
task.maidcode.programming_task.enable_co: Requires FunctionCall feature in Touhou Little Maid AI chat to be enabled
config.maidcode.task_config.enable.tip: Requires maid's work mode to be set to 'Programming' to operate computers
config.maidcode.task_config.enable_requi: Maids need to reach level 1 favorability to perform programming
